snippet: LOW--Marjorie. Congregation Emanu-El of the City of New York records with deep sorrow the death of our cherished longtime member, Marjorie Low. To her family and loved ones we express our profound sympathy. The beautiful qualities of her life shall endure forever in the hearts of those she loved. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LOW--Marjorie. Congregation Emanu-El of the City of New York records with deep sorrow the death of our cherished longtime member, Marjorie Low. To her family and loved ones we express our profound sympathy. The beautiful qualities of her life shall endure forever in the hearts of those she loved. 1/3
